code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE||'http://localhost:5000/api';export const createReminder=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/reminders"),data).then(r=>r.data);export const getReminders=email=>axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/reminders"),{params:{email}}).then(r=>r.data);export const saveSubscription=(subscription,userEmail)=>axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/subscriptions"),{subscription,userEmail}).then(r=>r.data);
